name: Duo Entis
description:
In Developent (Spanish for the moment)

(the game dont have the final video ending and there some bug.)

Control

W- Jump

A/D- Move left or right

There are 8 symbols on the screen. Touch them (Click with the mouse) and different orbs appears . Each orb unlock different obstacles as the symbol then appears in the level .

To kill the enemys use "light blue" orb.

Sorry for my english -.- jajaj

ENJOY THE GAME!!! :DDD
